en-us.learning_promise:
This unit will develop your students' understanding of computer science as they create sequences and loops, decompose problems, and improve programs to meet specific needs. They'll investigate ways of accurately describing the decisions they've made when creating a program, carry out fair tests, and develop their ability to generate and debug multiple solutions.

Your students will recount experiences using relevant facts and descriptive details. This will help them to improve their communication skills.

lessons.lesson_description: Help Daniel reach the Spike Tower by programming the river ferry to move!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Help Daniel reach the Spike Tower by programming the river ferry to move!

text.content: Today, Daniel is on a journey to explore Spike Town. He's excited to see all the new sights.
Daniel decides to visit the town's tallest building, Spike Tower. He must take the river ferry to get there.
Build the river ferry to help Daniel visit Spike Tower.
Here's your challenge: create the program that sends the river ferry to the Spike Tower.
Create the program. It sends the river ferry to the Spike Tower.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 1 River Ferry

lessons.lesson_description: Leo needs help getting to the art museum. Hail a taxi, and let’s go!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Leo needs help getting to the art museum. Hail a taxi, and let’s go!

text.content: Leo missed the bus this morning. He's frustrated.
Leo wanted to take the bus to get to the Spike Art Museum. Now he wonders how he’ll get there.
Build the taxi to help Leo get to the Spike Art Museum.
Here's your challenge: create the program that drives the taxi.
Create the program. It drives the taxi.

text.content: Test your program.
Modify your program to make the taxi follow the route on Leo's map.
Design a new route for Leo’s next trip.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 2 Taxi! Taxi!

lessons.lesson_description: Help Maria get to Spike Mountain for a hike!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Help Maria get to Spike Mountain for a hike!

text.content: Maria is excited! Today, she's going on a hiking adventure.
Maria wants to hike part of Spike Mountain.
Build a helicopter for Maria’s adventure to Spike Mountain.
Here's your challenge: create the program that starts the helicopter.
Create the program. It starts the helicopter.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 3 Hovering Helicopter

lessons.lesson_description: Sofie found crocodile eggs! Could there be crocodiles nearby?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Sofie found crocodile eggs! Could there be crocodiles nearby?

text.content: Sofie is content. She's watching the dragonflies in Spike Swamp.
Sofie notices crocodile eggs in a nest. She predicts that crocodiles must be nearby.
Build the swamp boat to help Sofie look for crocodiles.
Here's your challenge: create the program that tells Sofie when her boat is near a crocodile.
Create the program. It tells Sofie when her boat is near a crocodile.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 4 Swamp Boat

lessons.lesson_description: Leo is nervous about crossing Spike Lake in the cable car today. Can Maria help him conquer his fears?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Leo is nervous about crossing Spike Lake in the cable car today. Can Maria help him conquer his fears?

text.content: The cable car is a cool way to see Spike Lake from above! Leo is afraid of heights, but he still wants to try it.
Leo wants his friend Maria to come with him. It'll be better to try the cable car with a friend.
Build the cable car for Leo and Maria so they can see Spike Lake from above.
Here's your challenge: create the program that moves the cable car across the lake.
Create the program. It moves the cable car across the lake.

text.content: Modify your program to improve the cable car ride.
Upgrade the cable car for Leo and Maria’s next trip.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 5 Cable Car

lessons.lesson_description: Today is going to be an awesome day! Help Daniel get to the sports stadium to see the big game.
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Today is going to be an awesome day! Help Daniel get to the sports stadium to see the big game.

text.content: Today is going to be an awesome day! Daniel is going to see his favorite sports team at Spike Stadium.
Daniel is going to take the bus to get there.
Build the bus for Daniel to ride to Spike Stadium.
Here's your challenge: create the program that makes the bus stop for Daniel at the green stop.
Create the program. It makes the bus stop for Daniel at the green stop.

text.content: Modify your program to change the bus ride.
Upgrade the bus route to stop at different stops.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 6 Big Bus

lessons.lesson_description: The team is headed to Spike Castle! How can you help them get there?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: The team is headed to Spike Castle! How can you help them get there?

text.content: The team is ready to explore a new part of Spike Town. There's so much to see and do!
They're going to take a trip to the ancient Spike Castle.
Imagine how they'll get there.
Here's your challenge: create a way for the team to get to Spike Castle. Use at least one motor or sensor.
Here's your challenge: create a way for the team to get to Spike Castle. Use at least one motor or sensor.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed
- OPTIONAL: Additional materials for brainstorming (e.g., notebook paper, science notebook, etc.)

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 7 Get Around Town

en-us.title: Gecko Happy Traveler U3
en-us.unit_plan_description: Hello! Let’s go! Daniel, Sofie, Maria, and Leo are off on an adventure in a new town. Create, program, and test new vehicles to help the minifigures explore!
